say,"},{"lineNumber":118373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、あれはお前を倒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh, he defeated you."},{"lineNumber":118374,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラにとっては自慢の使徒だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He is Satella's proud Excellent, Satella!\""},{"lineNumber":118377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah...\""},{"lineNumber":118378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":118379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":118380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃあああああああああー！？！？！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaaaaaaaah!?!?!"},{"lineNumber":118381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前、聞いていたのかーー！？！？！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You were listeningーー!?!?!"},{"lineNumber":118382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":118383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph...\""},{"lineNumber":118384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいいい、今、笑ったか、お前ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"D-did you just laugh, you?!"},{"lineNumber":118385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスは面白くていい奴、かなー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe Rance is funny and a good guy."},{"lineNumber":118386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は大好き」","translatedEnglishLine":"I really like him.\""},{"lineNumber":118387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「全女性の敵ね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He's the enemy of all women."},{"lineNumber":118388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死んだ方が世の為よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It would be better for the world if he died.\""},{"lineNumber":118389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「志津香ーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shizukaーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":118390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃあーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":118391,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前みたいな生意気な女は！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A cheeky woman like you!"},{"lineNumber":118392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こうしてやる！　こうしてやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll do this to you! I'll do this to you!\""},{"lineNumber":118393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ちょっ！　やだ！　やめ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey! No! Stop!\""},{"lineNumber":118394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たかいたかいすんなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t do the 'takai takai' (lift you up high) game!\""},{"lineNumber":118395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　やーい、がきんちょー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! Hey, brat!\""},{"lineNumber":118396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんねー、ケッセルリンク様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, Lord Kessellink."},{"lineNumber":118397,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お姉様、素直じゃないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Big sister isn’t being honest.\""},{"lineNumber":118398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I see.\""},{"lineNumber":118399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However..."},{"lineNumber":118400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何故君は私を様付けで？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why do you address me with honorifics?\""},{"lineNumber":118401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー、なんとなく？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, just somehow?\""},{"lineNumber":118402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, I see.\""},{"lineNumber":118403,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........."},{"lineNumber":118404,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":118405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、これでアンケートは採り終わったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, with that, the survey is finished.\""},{"lineNumber":118406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":118407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうしてまとめて聞いてみると……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When you listen to all of this together..."},{"lineNumber":118408,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なるほど、中々面白い男だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, quite an interesting man.\""},{"lineNumber":118409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君についていく者が多数いるのも頷ける」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's understandable that many choose to follow you.\""},{"lineNumber":118410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……夢を見せるのが上手いな、君は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're good at showing people dreams, aren’t you?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「幸せになりたまえ」
「それがあの男にとって、
何よりの供養となる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the greatest way to honor him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは今すぐにでも抹殺するべきじゃ！
百害あって一利なし！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hundred harms and no benefit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、千害あって一利なしじゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, a thousand harms and no benefit!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えー、そんなことないよー。
おとーさん悪い人じゃないよ」
「悪い人じゃ！」
「今の代の女王は……
随分と賑やかなのだな」
「なんじゃ」
「溜まりに溜まったツケを返して欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want you to pay back the accumulated debts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッセルリンク……
お前そういうことサテラに聞くのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you ask Satella such things?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあいい、答えてやる」
「アレが英雄かどうかなど興味ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not interested in whether he is a hero or not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはランス、サテラの使徒だ」
「だが、強いて言うならば」
「ふふん、あれはお前を倒した。
サテラにとっては自慢の使徒だ」
「がははは、そーかそーか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, is that so, is that so!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく言った！　偉いぞ、サテラ！」
「ぎゃあああああああああー！？！？！？
お前、聞いていたのかーー！？！？！？」
「いいいい、今、笑ったか、お前ー！」
「ランスは面白くていい奴、かなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe Rance is funny and a good guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は大好き」
「全女性の敵ね。
死んだ方が世の為よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be better for the world if he died."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「志津香ーーーーー！」
「きゃあーーーーー！」
「お前みたいな生意気な女は！
こうしてやる！　こうしてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll do this to you! I'll do this to you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ちょっ！　やだ！　やめ！」
「たかいたかいすんなー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don’t do the 'takai takai' (lift you up high) game!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　やーい、がきんちょー！」
「ごめんねー、ケッセルリンク様。
お姉様、素直じゃないの」
「……そうか」
「しかし……
何故君は私を様付けで？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do you address me with honorifics?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えー、なんとなく？」
「ふっ、そうか」
「さて、これでアンケートは採り終わったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, with that, the survey is finished."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こうしてまとめて聞いてみると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you listen to all of this together...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、中々面白い男だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, quite an interesting man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君についていく者が多数いるのも頷ける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's understandable that many choose to follow you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……夢を見せるのが上手いな、君は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're good at showing people dreams, aren’t you?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
